title: AITA: He Made His Dad Cry After Comparing Him To His Stepdad!
description:
Comparison is a tricky game to play. It has more cons than pros, and can really crush someone's spirit if they are compared to someone or something that they may think isn't so favorable. A Bert Show listener is fed up and put his foot down after his dad compared him to his brother. This wasn't the first time that his dad had done this, but our listener wanted it to be the last.
